summary:
More than 13 years of work experience. Around 9 years of experience designing and developing software and around 4 years of experience of technical product and project management.

Deep understanding of OOA/OOP.

Experienced in software development methodologies like Agile Scrum

Experienced with network device (switch/bridge) firmware and web management software development

Experienced with network programming and client-server based applications.

Experienced with multi-threaded and real time programming.

Ability to understand complex systems, to identify improvement opportunities, and to resolve critical issues.

Good communication skills, self-motivation and drive to learn new things.

Ability to work well under pressure and deadlines.

Driving Licence; A2,E,D

profile_positions.description:
I was working in PAVOTEK as an experienced software design and development engineer in order to develop novel network switches and routers which contains new technologies. For this purpose I performed some researches about emerging technologies. Also I was working as a mentor in our organization for my collogues’ tasks especially for software design and coding. So far I performed following tasks.
	I performed ONIE porting study to our novel network devices. 
	Development for our new switch and router software stack and preparing compile script for file system, U-Boot and Linux kernel.
	Coding on U-Boot for additional requirements and customizations for routers and switches.
Beginning of the September 2020 I started working as Project Manager in PAVOTEK due to organizational changes. In this role I was responsible all of product; requirement analysis, specifications, defining architectures, implementations, managing and supported SW engineers while developing code, planning sprints etc.
In the last 6 months at PAVOTEK, I have designed and coded the  Multi Unit Stack system for our switches..
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
I was working in Siemens as a senior software design and development engineer to develop Siemens’ next generation switch’s platform targeted to Industry 4.0 “Digital Factories”. For That purpose I was a member of CSRP (Common Switch and Routing Platform) project. It was a SW platform for next generation Siemens Industrial Switches. Project was developed in three different countries which were Germany, Canada and Turkey. 

I and other team members in Turkey are responsible for developing device management platform which was the web interface. In this project my main tasks were;
	Being contact person between other team members and team leaders in Germany and Canada.
	Distributes the tasks among the team members.
	Designing overall architecture for device specific webui platform.
	Designing new web interfaces of device using AngularJS and HTML.

Beginning of May I started a new project in same group which was a new emerging technology network device. This was emerging network technology that became newly standardized for networks called TSN.
In this project my main tasks were mostly same as previous project;
	Being contact person between other team members and team leader in Germany.
	Distributing the tasks among the team members.
	Designing and implementing (in C and C++) overall architecture of TSN Stack and TSN Library for different devices  which have different operation systems.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:
TUBITAK (The Scientific and Technological Research Council of Turkey) Application of Within The Scope 1512  Information Technologies

Project Owner / Entrepreneur

Between these dates, I have prepared an application to the TUBITAK 1512 Individual Young Enterprise program with an idea that I have about home automation and smart home management system. In this progress I got trainings about project management, budget management and preparing application document to the TUBITAK from Universite’s Technology Offices.

Within these days in order to create the necessary infrastructure and prove the operability of the idea I develop code in C/C++, C# and PHP.
profile_positions.title: Entrepreneur

profile_positions.description:
I joined Turkcell Teknoloji at 17th June of 2013 as Technical Product & Project Manager. My main duties are defining the products specifications, doing researches of innovative products for embedded systems, particularly for M2M systems, coordinating all phases of HW/SW production/development from beginning of planning the production to delivery to customers. 
I define the products specifications for prototyping that will be realized by the research engineers that work in Applied Research Laboratory according to our customers’ needs. 
I prepared manufacturing, support and purchasing contracts for products that I was responsible.
I manage the necessary plannings to eliminate the problems if customers have, while using or setting up our product.
I visit to customers in order to understand their needs for custom product design. After that I do prototyping with HW/SW engineers that based on customer requirements. In some circumstances I write/manage code in several programming languages with developers in order to set up SW architecture and to prove concept.
In order to perform all above duties I am coordinating lab staff and outsources like software engineers, production plant staff and support engineers.
Beside all those duties, I am National Coordinator for a while one of ITEA2 project which is called CarCoDe.
profile_positions.title: Technical Product & Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
My main duty is designing system and software architectures, using with C# and MSSQL database environment.

I am working on design of the remote meter reading system or Automatic Meter Reading System (AMRS). Main responsibilities are designing of the communication state machines and protocols between back office software system and modems in order to use to read data from meters, preparation of system software which are processing read data from meters and recording them into database. In addition that, I am a member of a team for examining the tender specifications of requirements about Automatic Meter Reading Systems.

Beside AMRS projects, I am working to design software and systems (hardware) for analysis of overall equipment effectiveness.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Consultant

profile_positions.description: Design and implementation an Operating System and Abstraction Model for Wireless Sensor Network devices in order to reduce application development life cycle and easy porting different micro controllers.
profile_positions.title: Core Development Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
Work as a Senior Software Design Engineer responsible for embedded system design and development for Consumer Electronic Devices


Projects:
	DVD Recorder: Classic stand-alone DVD Recorder which records video content from analog broadcasting with various media playback capability. This device is based on WindRiver’s VxWorks Operating system. 
Responsible for designing test and debug software and layout of remote controller. (C/C++ device Side, Delphi PC Side)

	DVD Recorder with HDD: This device is a video recorder from analog broadcasting to DVD or HDD and provides to users a media box capability. It supports DiVX, MP3 and various picture format playback. This device is based on AT Nucleus Operating System. 
Responsible for designing and developing chip’s and peripheral’s device deriver (e.g. front panel driver, PTC6317 chip driver etc.) some patches (especially for video driver and tuner driver), some UI customization and remote controller layout design. This project sold in Europe and Türkiye. (AT Nucleus, ANSI C)

	LCD PVR: A combo product, LCD TV containing a Recorder module from “DVD Recorder with HDD” project. 
Working as a Project Leader and developer. I designed product specification, application SW at PVR side and communication protocols between two different HW block via UART. This project finished and sold in Turkey and won “Good Design” award from USA. (AT Nucleus, ANSI C)

	DVB-T: Terrestrial Satellite Receiver for United Kingdom.
Responsible for designing and developing of MHEG1.06 block’s Dynamic Line Art module and TS Engine block. (Linux, C++)

	Electronic Cash Register: A cheap cash register project (cost-down project).
Responsible for middleware and drivers’ design and implementation. In this project I worked as a project manager and leader. I defined project requirements, tasks and risks to complete the project. I manage a team of six people during the project time frame. (ANSI C).
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer
